title: How to Make Cell Phone Wallpapers

steps.headline: Find some pictures.
steps.description: Run a quick search on the Internet with some keywords of things you are interested in. This should bring up a whole bunch of photos containing your favourite things. If you like more than one thing, run several searches.

steps.headline: Pick some photos.
steps.description: Now that you've found hundreds of photos, you will need to pick some to use. It's recommended that you pick about 10-15 photos. That way, you'll have enough to choose from but not so many that you'll get confused with what you have.

steps.headline: Save the photos to your computer.
steps.description: To keep all the photos in a safe place, consider creating a new folder dedicated specifically to storing your potential wallpapers.

steps.headline: Pick the best image.
steps.description: Out of the pictures you have, choose your favourite one. Remember that you're going to have to see this picture every time you turn on your phone, are you sure it's the one you want?

steps.headline: Hook your phone up to your computer.
steps.description: When your phone is connected, you will be able to put the image onto it.

steps.headline: Put the image onto your phone.
steps.description: Open up documents. Locate the picture that you want. Drag and drop it to your phone.

steps.headline: Find the image on your phone.
Set it as your wallpaper, with the method your specific phone has for doing this.
steps.description: These steps and buttons will vary.

tyn: images to use on your cellphone
USB cord or email address attached to your cell phone's imaging-text message service
text: Find some pictures. Run a quick search on the Internet with some keywords of things you are interested in. This should bring up a whole bunch of photos containing your favourite things. If you like more than one thing, run several searches. Pick some photos. Now that you've found hundreds of photos, you will need to pick some to use. It's recommended that you pick about 10-15 photos. That way, you'll have enough to choose from but not so many that you'll get confused with what you have. Save the photos to your computer. To keep all the photos in a safe place, consider creating a new folder dedicated specifically to storing your potential wallpapers. Pick the best image. Out of the pictures you have, choose your favourite one. Remember that you're going to have to see this picture every time you turn on your phone, are you sure it's the one you want? Hook your phone up to your computer. When your phone is connected, you will be able to put the image onto it. Put the image onto your phone. Open up documents. Locate the picture that you want. Drag and drop it to your phone. Find the image on your phone.  Set it as your wallpaper, with the method your specific phone has for doing this. These steps and buttons will vary.
sentences: Find some pictures.
Run a quick search on the Internet with some keywords of things you are interested in.
This should bring up a whole bunch of photos containing your favourite things.
If you like more than one thing, run several searches.
Pick some photos.
Now that you've found hundreds of photos, you will need to pick some to use.
It's recommended that you pick about 10-15 photos.
That way, you'll have enough to choose from but not so many that you'll get confused with what you have.
Save the photos to your computer.
To keep all the photos in a safe place, consider creating a new folder dedicated specifically to storing your potential wallpapers.
Pick the best image.
Out of the pictures you have, choose your favourite one.
Remember that you're going to have to see this picture every time you turn on your phone, are you sure it's the one you want?
Hook your phone up to your computer.
When your phone is connected, you will be able to put the image onto it.
Put the image onto your phone.
Open up documents.
Locate the picture that you want.
Drag and drop it to your phone.
Find the image on your phone.
Set it as your wallpaper, with the method your specific phone has for doing this.
These steps and buttons will vary.
